name: SQUIDUDE
description:
In this game, you play as Squidude - a nice squid - as he attempts to retrieve as much coolness from the jealous Turtloser. Click and drag Squidude through obstacles and randomly triggered events to hit cool energy points and save the world.

This is a prototype for a randomly generated point and drag adventure game. There are several ideas not utilized in this limited engine and time. Although this is a PC game, it was built with mobile apps in mind. In the future, I'd like to use touch controls for the mouse. Better story, graphics, custom characters, and a much more diverse set of enemies/levels are in mind for a future project.

Some sound effects from Juhani Junkala are utilized with permission.
